statements: SELECT id, name, description FROM harmony;
SELECT * FROM harmony WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, id FROM harmony ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT description FROM harmony WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM harmony WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT id, name, description FROM harmony WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM harmony WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, id FROM harmony WHERE description LIKE '%important%' LIMIT 5 OFFSET 2;
SELECT description FROM harmony WHERE name = 'music' OR name = 'peace' ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM harmony WHERE name LIKE 'H%' OR description LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY id DESC, name ASC;
SELECT * FROM harmony;
SELECT id, concept FROM melody ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT concept, description FROM harmony WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM melody WHERE concept LIKE '%min%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, notes FROM melody WHERE id BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT * FROM harmony;
SELECT id, concept FROM melody WHERE id = 3;
SELECT description FROM harmony WHERE concept = 'optimism';
SELECT * FROM melody ORDER BY concept DESC;
SELECT id, notes FROM melody WHERE concept = 'joy' OR concept = 'sadness' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM harmony;
SELECT concept_name, concept_description FROM harmony;
SELECT concept_id, concept_name, concept_description FROM harmony ORDER BY concept_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM melody WHERE key_signature='C major';
SELECT concept_name, tempo FROM melody WHERE tempo > 100;
SELECT * FROM melody WHERE key_signature = 'C Major';
SELECT concept_name, tempo FROM melody ORDER BY tempo DESC;
SELECT concept_name, rhythm_pattern FROM rhythm WHERE metronome_speed > 120;
SELECT concept_id, concept_name FROM harmony ORDER BY concept_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM rhythm WHERE rhythm_pattern LIKE '%complex%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Harmony;
SELECT name, description FROM Harmony ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Melody WHERE duration > 3;
SELECT note, duration FROM Melody WHERE harmony_id = 2;
SELECT concept_name FROM MusicTheoryConcepts WHERE category = 'Chords';
SELECT * FROM Harmony WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, description FROM Harmony WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM Melody JOIN Harmony ON Melody.harmony_id = Harmony.id;
SELECT concept_name, category FROM MusicTheoryConcepts ORDER BY category DESC;
SELECT concept_name, category FROM MusicTheoryConcepts WHERE category = 'Chords' ORDER BY concept_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Harmony;
SELECT concept, description FROM Harmony WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Melody ORDER BY duration DESC;
SELECT note, tonality FROM Melody WHERE tonality = 'Major';
SELECT * FROM Rhythm WHERE tempo BETWEEN 120 AND 140;
SELECT * FROM Harmony;
SELECT concept, description FROM Harmony WHERE id = 1;
SELECT note, duration FROM Melody ORDER BY duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM Rhythm WHERE tempo BPM > 100;
SELECT id, scale_type FROM Scale WHERE intervals LIKE '%whole%';
